cast.overview: An aged Charlie Chaplin narrates his life to his autobiography's editor, including his rise to wealth and comedic fame from poverty, his turbulent personal life and his run-ins with the FBI.
cast.title: Chaplin

details.biography: Nick Corello also known as Nicky Corello is an American character actor noted for this work in the Steven Segal Movies Hard To Kill, Out for Justice and Marked for Death. Hes also known for playing Sammy "The Blade"  the henchman of Jon Polito's character Michael "The Suit" Minelli in The Superhero Comedy Blankman, which Starred Comedian Damon Wayans as the titular character.  Corello also appeared in Colors alongside Robert Duvall and Sean Penn.
details.name: Nick Corello
